name: Corner Enchanting Store
description:
Your job as an enchanter is to bless people's scrolls with the power of runes!

You can close or open the curtain by pulling the yellow cloth! Opening the curtain will automatically turn in your scroll! Mute the music by pressing M!

Gameplay time: 5 Minutes Average

Short Intro:

When a new person comes to the store, they will show you a scroll based on 3 attributes: strength, intelligence and agility. All you have to do after closing the curtain is using your relics in order to replicate that scroll! After opening the curtain the client will reward you based on your precision, or demand payback...
Reach 100 coins to win, but be careful not to go too much into debt as once you go bellow -20 coins, you will lose.

Character sprites were created by: Calciumtrice

Music was created by: Random Mind
